Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
My Ad Management section i sempty--my campaigns have disappeared. How can I retrieve/reactivate them?

I'm sorry to hear that your campaigns have disappeared from the Ad Management section. Let's try to resolve this issue. Could you please confirm if there have been any recent changes to your account, such as updates to your payment method or any other modifications? This information will help me assist you better.
No changes. I was literally inthe account working on a campaign and when I refreshed the page, everything was gone.

Thanks for the details. It sounds like there might be a temporary glitch or issue with your account. I recommend logging out and then logging back into your account to see if that resolves the issue. If the problem persists, please try clearing your browser cache or using a different browser. If none of these steps work, you may need to contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!
Hello, I am attempting to create video ads, but when entering the campaign url I receive two error messages> 'URL must begin with https:// or htp://" (it does) and

It sounds like you're having trouble with the URL format while creating your video ads. Please ensure that the URL starts with "http://" or "https://" without any capitalization errors, especially the 'h'. Double-check for any typos or extra spaces at the beginning of the URL. If everything seems correct and you're still facing issues, try using a different browser or clearing your cache to see if that resolves the problem. For more detailed guidance on creating video ads, you can refer to this article: [How to create a video ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/19294845964045-How-to-create-a-video-ad). Let me know if you need further assistance!
